entries.description: Amazon Q: Security scans can now run automatically when file changes are made
Amazon Q: Send security issue to chat for explanation and fix
Amazon Q: Security scans can now run on all files in the project
Amazon Q Chat: Added additional parameters to onCopyCodeToClipboard and onCodeInsertToCursorPosition events
Amazon Q Code Transformation: include details about expected changes in transformation plan
Connection id is now shown beside CodeCatalyst dropdown
Amazon Q Chat: Updates quick action commands style and groupings
Amazon Q Chat: Q panel doesn't fit to its parent
Amazon Q Code Feature Development: Update welcome message and menu item description for /dev command
Amazon Q Feature Development: Update error message for monthly conversation limit reach
